#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n;
	string a;
	char  b;
	scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        map<string ,int>score;
        while(n--)
        {
            
            
                cin>>a;
                cin>>b;
                if(b=='+')
                score[a]=1;
                else
                score[a]=-1;

            
           
        }
         map<string,int>::iterator it=score.begin();
         int count=0;

            while(it!=score.end())
            {
                //cout<<it->first<<" "<<it->second<<endl;
                count+=it->second;
                it++;
            }
            cout<<count<<endl;
		

    }

	return 0;
}
